div.p: This schema represents an area (measure of a surface)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
CodeDisplay
mm2mm^2
cm2cm^2
m2m^2
km2km^2
[sin_i]in^2
[sft_i]ft^2
[syd_i]yd^2
[smi_i]mi^2

description.value: This schema represents an area (measure of a surface)
